thread.title: Bruins sign G Gustavsson

author: The Sports Xchange
title: Bruins sign G Gustavsson
text:
Bruins sign G Gustavsson The Sports Xchange 10 hrs ago The Sports Xchange Â© (AP Photo/Steven Senne Boston Bruins goalie Jonas Gustavsson, of Sweden, left, deflects the puck as New Jersey Devils right wing Lee Stempniak, right, watches during the first period of an NHL preseason hockey game, Sunday, Sept. 20, 2015, in Providence, R.I. (AP Photo/Steven Senne) The Boston Bruins signed goaltender Jonas Gustavsson to a one-year, one-way contract for this season worth a cap figure of $700,000, the team announced Sunday.
AdChoices Gustavsson played for the Detroit Red Wings from 2012 to 2015. He appeared in 41 games for the Red Wings and had a 21-10-6 record.
Last season, he played in seven games, including six starts, and had a 3-3 record with a 2.56 goals-against average. His playing time last season was limited because of a separated shoulder and concussion symptoms.
The 30-year-old Gustavsson has played in 148 NHL games in his career, with a 60-55-21 record with a 2.89 goals against average.
